membership: ECTAA is Member of NET, the Network of European Private Enterpreneurs in the Tourism sector.
goals__remit: ECTAA is representing European Travel Agents' and Tour Operators' Associations. It counts among its membership associations of 27 Member States of the European Union as well as associations of Serbia, Montenegro, Norway and Switzerland. All together, ECTAA represents some 80,000 European undertakings.
